title: 012: IIFYM and Diet Insanity
description: Just how far will people go to lose weight? Pretty damn far... When people divert the effort they put into ridiculous weight loss and diet fads into educating themselves about what REALLY works, losing fat becomes far easier. In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin take this topic head-on so be prepared to hear the truth raw and unedited.
